name: Book Reviews API
title: Book Reviews API
description: The USA TODAY Book Reviews API provides a method for retrieving USA TODAY's book reviews conent. In addition to the textual content of a review, the API returns various types of metadata associated with each title. All reviews information is available in a JSON handler. Please refer to our documentation below which describes in detail how data can be requested and returned.

Most Recent Book Reviews.description: Returns the most 25 most recent reviews. The number of reviews returned may be altered using the count parameter.

batch.description: y/n. Setting batch to y will return only these batch reviews, and setting it to n will return only non-batch reviews. By default, the Books Reviews API returns all available content.

count.description: Use this value to set the number of reviews returned. By default, most recent directory returns 25 reviews and the book and author directories return all available information.

encoding.description: Only JSON is Supported for the Book Reviews API

All reviews for a book.description: Returns a list of all available book reviews for a given book.

search.description: Search string for book name. Example: Harry+Potter

batch.description: y/n. Setting batch to y will return only these batch reviews, and setting it to n will return only non-batch reviews. By default, the Books Reviews API returns all available content.

count.description: Use this value to set the number of reviews returned. By default, most recent directory returns 25 reviews and the book and author directories return all available information.

encoding.description: Only JSON is Supported for the Book Reviews API

All Authors with book reviews.description: Returns detailed review information for all the albums written by a specific artist.
